titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
May 11 PERKINS 1933 Mrs Perkins Trocadero 18-75 15 rue de Franqueville
1 yr 1 v 175,00 dep 50
ren? May 11 March of Democracy card 19 May May 26 26 America as A. Sees it. " 31 31 loaned to Shakespeare & Co credit Power and Democracy returned. June 20 March of Democracy 2nd vol June 29
interrupted 29 June 1933. 7 Oct has 3 mos & 17 days Oct 7 Mrs Perkins owes $1 balance on subsc to Nat. Geog. paid $3 abroad $4 also for copy sent to Miss Perkins see account card Nov 10 Autobiography of Toklas 13 13 17 High Wind in Jamaica Nov 21 25 (Striplings has come) Women take nothing 27 Dec 2 Miss Lonelyhearts Dec 11 " 11 Berlin Tenement Dec 18 Feb 13 Beggar's Opera (S.B.'s copy) Feb 15 " 15 Tales of Modern China March 1 Epic East March 1 March 1 To make my bread March 12 Tobit Transplanted March 12
March 16 Ten Days that shook the world April 23 April 3 Land & Sea Tales April 11 Thy Servant a Dog April 11 23 What Everybody wants to know about Money
